of Nectar

Unvieling medicinal properties inherent in food stuffs

Get Started

Accelerating evolution through curated research into food compounds and their health effects

We offer a variety of extracts, and pairings, for the directed evolution of individuals through researched nutraceuticals and an optimal pairing of compounds to increase bioavailability. We, at of Nectar, also provide consulting to individuals at request, and work with corporations on research into compound - disease affinities.

AI Research & Compound Applications

Traditionally, the trials of uncovering cultural staples via moderate changes to common foods has occurred across generations. We believe the age of technology has reigned in a new appropriation of culture founded in technology, this has significantly altered the course of humanity, accelerating transformations in many aspects of life. Bringing computational power vying as if mythology, it is but the course of momentum to carry over to our dinner table. The future has been envisioned where instead of centuries, food staples will rise in what will seem to be overnight, the shift caused by of Nectarâ€™s initiation into modeling the Need of Sustenance.

Directed

Utilizing advancements in technology, we are on the cusp of allowing individuals full control of what they grow into. Not only are we studying compounds and effects directly, but we also use natural language understanding to find, summarize, and parse information related to foods, diseases, and health that our forebears spent lifetime investigating, and validating.

Evolve

We offer compound pairings for the more efficient materialization of efforts.
On request we offer personalized recommendations on food intake, physical rehabilitation, and general health.

Explore Educational Resources Educational Resources is an expiremental application to study research effects of food articles on health. Future iterations will include recipes with the flexibility to adjust based on your current objectives, and considerations. As well as the ability to filter textbooks, and other resources, to contain only information that is relevant to your question/objective.

Applying curated research into unveiling the medicnal properties at the core of all foods, of Nectar aims to change the society we live in through appropriation of new cultures, and the directed applciation of food effects.
